overview: The Erie Canal was an engineering marvel in its time and remains so today. This documentary travels from Palmyra to the Genesee River, stopping along the way to visit the people and places that make the canal so special. Canal historian Thomas Grasso offers insight into the canalâ€™s past while the Golden Eagle String Band provides the music track.
tagline: Travel from Palmyra, Macedon, Fairport, and Pittsford to Rochester
title: 15 Miles On The Erie Canal (Part 1)
